constituent: hope, sheaf, linen, by one’s side, towel
koohiiStory1: I hope this works, you say as you stuff a sheaf of stalks under your blanket but above your linens. Your real hope is that your parents don´t find out that you left the house.
koohiiStory2: Wolverine (sheaf, see reap (#1488)) hopes they invent linen sheets that he won´t keep shredding in his sleep.
words: 希望(きぼう): hope, wish, aspiration
